description:
An OpenSource Managed Wrapper around un4seen Bass and some of its addons.
This project is currently in development.
You can contribute to it on GitHub.

The Library is compiled for AnyCPU.
But the Bass dlls need to be checked for x64 or x86.
Put the Bass dlls in the same folder as ManagedBass.dll.
ManagedBass does not need to be licensed for Commercial use, but bass and many of the addons have to be.
Check the below website for more details
Bass dlls are available at http://www.un4seen.com/bass
Bass and its Addons are trademarks of their respective owners.
releaseNotes:
THERE ARE SOME INCOMPATIBLE CHANGES

•Completely wrapped BassMidi.
•WasapiDevice struct now exposes only properties, hides WasapiDeviceInfoFlags
•Read() methods return int (no of bytes read) instead of void.
•BassDevices: PlaybackDevice and RecordingDevice now have Singleton Implementation
•Added UnitTest project
•Fixed some careless mistakes in DeviceInfo.cs.
•Fixed Device Enumerator Stack Overflows and performance. Return IEnumerable instead of Arrays.
•enum BufferKind renamed to Resolution.
•changed abstract class AudioFileWriter to interface IAudioFileWriter : IDisposable
•Added Extensions.SupportsFloatingPoint Property (based on BASS docs).
•IAudioWriter defines Write() overloads for byte[], short[] and float[].
•Added ValueConverters - Samples, Seconds, Bytes.
•enum ChannelTypeFlags renamed to ChannelType.
•BassCd Device Enumerator improvements.
•BQFEffect class made non-abstract and removed the inheriters.
summary: An OpenSource Managed Wrapper around un4seen Bass
title: ManagedBass
